001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import com.google.gson.Gson;
005import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
006import dagger.Module;
007import dagger.Provides;
008import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
010import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.service.PassphraseServiceProxy;
013import javax.inject.Singleton;
014import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
015import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
016import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
017import retrofit2.Retrofit;
018import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
019import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
020
021@Module
022@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
023public final class ProxyModule {
024
025  ProxyModule() {
026  }
027
028  @Provides
029  @Singleton
030  public PassphraseServiceProxy provideProxy(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
031    Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
032        .excludeFieldsWithoutExposeAnnotation()
033        .setDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ")
034        .create();
035    HttpLoggingInterceptor interceptor = new HttpLoggingInterceptor();
036    interceptor.setLevel(Level.BODY);
037    OkHttpClient client = new OkHttpClient.Builder()
038        .addInterceptor(interceptor)
039        .build();
040    Retrofit retrofit = new Retrofit.Builder()
041        .baseUrl(context.getString(R.string.service_base_url))
042        .addConverterFactory(GsonConverterFactory.create(gson))
043        .addCallAdapterFactory(RxJava3CallAdapterFactory.create())
044        .client(client)
045        .build();
046    return retrofit.create(PassphraseServiceProxy.class);
047  }
048
049}
